description: Paper construction with printed colored photographic images opening like an expanding photo camera. Under two hard cloth covers with ribbon. Two cards (one with information about the artist and the book, one a greeting card) included; enclosed in a green cloth folding case with ivory satin ties.
marks: \"Peter Norton Family Christmas Project 2001 by Ann
medium: Artist's multiple consisting of paper construction with color photolithographs designed as a peep show; housed in two hard cloth covers with ribbon
title: Untitled
